body: You have remained undecided when it comes to your faith, but are accepting of others' faiths and are at least somewhat open to the idea of joining an organized faith should you find one that strikes your fancy. You gain access to the Ease of Faith faith trait.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 3-Moral Conflicts/Relationships/and Drawbacks/Crime and Punishment/Deity and Religious Philosophy/Undecided
name: Undecided
